title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: TPACK and Technological Belief Development for Pre-Service Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can practice integrating technology into science classes with over 85% engagement in a Technology-Enhanced Active Learning Environment (TEALE)
Learners can achieve over 70% improvement after utilizing diagnostic tools for each TPACK component (Technological, Pedagogical, and Content Knowledge)
Learners can develop three or more technology-integrated lesson designs based on personalized learning analytics from a mobile microlearning platform
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
